quotes.message: The best way out is always through.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quotes.name: William B. Sprague

quotes.message: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Whether you think you can or think you can't, you are right.
quotes.name: Henry Ford

quotes.message: Falling down is how we grow. Staying down is how we die.
quotes.name: Brian Vaszily

quotes.message: It is not what we take up, but what we give up, that makes us rich.
quotes.name: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.message: It takes courage to grow up and turn out to be who you really are.
quotes.name: E.E. Cummings

quotes.message: In order to be effective truth must penetrate like an arrow -- and that is likely to hurt.
quotes.name: Wei Wu Wei

quotes.message: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.name: George Eliot

quotes.message: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
quotes.name: Kevin Kruse

quotes.message: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.name: Albert Einstein

quotes.message: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.name: Robert Frost

quotes.message: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.name: Florence Nightingale

quotes.message: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.name: Og Mandino

quotes.message: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.name: C. S. Lewis

quotes.message: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
quotes.name: Philip Sidney

quotes.message: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.name: Judy Garland

quotes.message: Judge each day not by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.
quotes.name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.message: The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
quotes.name: Walter Bagehot

quotes.message: If you don't make mistakes, you aren't really trying.
quotes.name: Coleman Hawkins

quotes.message: Do not go where the path may lead; go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
quotes.name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.message: Forget about all the reasons why something may not work. You only need to find one good reason why it will.
quotes.name: Dr. Robert Anthony

quotes.message: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.name: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
quotes.name: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quotes.message: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.name: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.message: Thinking will not overcome fear, but action will.
quotes.name: W. Clement Stone

quotes.message: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
quotes.name: Lao Tzu

quotes.message: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.
quotes.name: Nora Roberts

quotes.message: The trouble with not having a goal is that you can spend your life running up and down the field and never score.
quotes.name: Bill Copeland

quotes.message: Great minds discuss ideas. Average minds discuss events. Small minds discuss people.
quotes.name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.message: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
quotes.name: Milton Berle

quotes.message: I haven't failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quotes.name: Thomas Edison

quotes.message: Be not afraid of greatness. Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon 'em.
quotes.name: William Shakespeare

quotes.message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.name: Walt Disney Company

quotes.message: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: Accept responsibility for your life. Know that it is you who will get you where you want to go, no one else.
quotes.name: Les Brown

quotes.message: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.name: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.message: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.name: Bill Cosby

quotes.message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: Don't worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don't even try.
quotes.name: Jack Canfield

quotes.message: Good, better, best. Don't ever rest, until good is better and better is best.
quotes.name: Janet Reno

quotes.message: Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises.
quotes.name: Demosthenes

quotes.message: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.name: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.message: The key to success isn't much good until one discovers the right lock to insert it in.
quotes.name: Tehyi Hsieh

quotes.message: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
quotes.name: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.message: The distance is nothing when one has a motive.
quotes.name: Jane Austen

quotes.message: Motivation remains key to the marathon: the motivation to begin; the motivation to continue; the motivation never to quit.
quotes.name: Hal Higdon

quotes.message: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
quotes.name: Norman R. Augustine

quotes.message: Motivation is a fire from within. If someone else tries to light that fire under you, chances are it will burn very briefly.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Motivation is highest when the probability of success is 50 percent: We don't get involved if the task is too easy or too hard.
quotes.name: Judith M. Bardwick

quotes.message: Motivation clears the head faster than a nasal spray.
quotes.name: William Zinsser

quotes.message: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.name: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.message: One very important aspect of motivation is the willingness to stop and to look at things that no one else has bothered to look at. This simple process of focusing on things that are normally taken for granted is a powerful source of creativity.
quotes.name: Edward de Bono

quotes.message: People need motivation to do anything. I don't think human beings learn anything without desperation.
quotes.name: Jim Carrey

quotes.message: People often say that motivation does not last, well, neither does bathing, that's why we recommend it daily.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: People who are unable to motivate themselves must be content with mediocrity, no matter how impressive their other talents.
quotes.name: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.message: Whatever you're thinking, think bigger.
quotes.name: Tony Hsieh

quotes.message: Go! Go! Go! It makes no difference where just so you go! go! go! Remember at the first opportunity go!
quotes.name: Jeanette Rankin

quotes.message: Don't be nervous. Work calmly, joyously, recklessly on whatever is in hand.
quotes.name: Henry Miller

quotes.message: If everyone waited until they felt 'motivated' to do something, we'd never get anything done. Stop looking for motivation. Take action. The motivation will follow.
quotes.name: Preethi Kasireddy

quotes.message: Most people don't need more motivation. They just need a big plan and a little accountability.
quotes.name: Jack Butcher

quotes.message: To be inspired is to be pulled toward something; to be motivated is to be pushed by yourself or others.
quotes.name: Thomas J. Leonard

quotes.message: I walk slowly, but I never walk backward.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.message: Your goals have to be big enough to get you out of bed.
quotes.name: Paul McKenna

quotes.message: Don't give up. Normally it is the last key on the ring which opens the door.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: I am not discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
quotes.name: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.message: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.name: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.message: Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.name: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.message: Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny, inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
quotes.name: Golda Meir

quotes.message: I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back.
quotes.name: Erica Jong

quotes.message: Sometimes you can do everything right and things will still go wrong. The key is to never stop doing right.
quotes.name: Angie Thomas

quotes.message: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.
quotes.name: Barack Obama

quotes.message: You can, you should, and if you're brave enough to start, you will.
quotes.name: Stephen King

quotes.message: Rest in reason; move in passion.
quotes.name: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.message: If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don't have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
quotes.name: Steve Jobs

quotes.message: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
